reviews.review: This movie is great! Lots of people argue that it has a bad ending, and that its like half of a movie, but whats the other half? (SPOILER ALERT) "They have to fight Thanos" People say but that's a different story. This was his quest for the stones and half of the universe dies. Not the Avengers Turning back time to save a few trillion people. LOVE THIS MOVIE!!!!

beaucoup de gens sur ce site critique infinity war pour son manque de scenario (ou du moins parce qu'il ne le comprenne pas car ils n'ont pas vu les autres films) ou pour sa trop imposante liste de personnages.....certes imparfait par moment (et encore il faut chercher la petite bête) , il faut savoir que ce film est la représentation parfaite de ce que je rêvais  lorsque j'avais  8 à 9 ans....oui j'ai 50 ans bientôt et à l'époque les moyens techniques ne permettaient pas ce genre de film....alors je peux le dire , j'ai pris un pied rarement atteint en regardant ce chef d'uvre geek. tous les critiques guindés qui sous estime ce film car ce n'est pas un film d'auteur ou on se fait c.....r a longueur de temps peuvent aller se rhabiller  , je n'echangerai pas mon infinity war contre une leçon de piano  si vous voyez ce que je veux dire....le haut du panier du cinema pop corn a grand spectacle oui, et fier de l'être.magnifique....

The entire universe is at stake! Again?
Yes, it's impressive that Marvel have built up to this point for the previous ten years. Yes, people are going crazy avoiding spoilers and buying tickets. But that aside, as a film without all the dizzying hype attached Infinity War feels like just another Avengers movie, but with less emotion and more confusion. There comes a point when you use too much CGI. Marvel have reached this point. At times the CGI is a headache inducing, disorientating journey into a universe with too many characters - even for its 2 hour and 39 minute run-time. The list of dislikes and errors seems to long to mention. I judge a film on its ability to stay with you, to make you think about the plot and the characters even days after you've seen it. Avengers, Infinity War leaves you the moment you walk out of the cinema. You stay for two and a half hours to be given an ending that leaves you saying, "What? That's it?"
Had 2 pretty good experiences in IMAX 3D and Dolby, great movie.

I've seen the Movie, Outstanding well everything the Story was great Battle Scenes were Amazing this Movie was really good it was Sad sometimes Mad And then other times it would make you Happy. I really think movie deserves somewhere in the 90% or more I suggest that everyone should watch this movie.

"Avengers: Infinity War" is definitely the most shocking of all the MCU movies. The movie flows together nicely so that every Avengers gets their moment to shine. Josh Brolin's performance is truly terrifying that cements him as one of the top superhero villains of all time. Their are plenty of twists and turns that will have the audience coming back for more.
